Docs.summary: This class is used when a SamlAssertion is received without a <ds:KeyInfo> element inside the signature element. The KeyInfo describes the key required to check the signature. When the key is needed this clause will be presented to the current . It will contain the SamlAssertion fully read which can be queried to determine the key required.
